data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kataev, Boris M., Wrase, David W. (2015): Acinopus sabulosus and A. lepeletieri from north-west Africa are two distinct species (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Harpalini). Zootaxa 4007 (2): 290-294, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4007.2.12
